properties.Name: NameUsage
properties.Description:
A usage or classification of names based on their function or application.

Ex:
- US legal name
- Westernized name
- Correspondence-To Name
- Military Name
- Professional Name
- Chinese Family Name

Columns.Name: NameUsageId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a name usage.

Columns.Name: NameUsageName
Columns.Description: The name of a name usage.

Columns.Name: NameUsageDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a name usage.
